description:
In a city under martial law, Jimon Asuta runs away from home and runs into Hoshimiya Kate, a little girl collapsed on the street.  It turns out that she is Venera the Great, leader of the secret society Zvezda.  Kate is on a mission to conquer the world, and she forces Asuta to become a member of Zvezda.  As the two of them walk through the dark and quiet streets, an explosion rocks the city as a giant monster appears.
Source: crunchyroll
